original: Johansson, Botvid Karl Gustaf, redaktör, Huskvarna, f. 28/7/72 i Huskvarna av Alfred J. o. Ida Maria Wel-terhoilm. — Platsred. i Huskvarna f. Jönköp.-Posten 99-40, utg. av Huskvarna-Posten sed. 11, annonschef i H. HaMs Boktryckeri A-B 16-40, red. o. an,sv. utg. av Huskvarna KFUM mån:-blad sed. 20. Led. av stadsfuHm. 11-42, av berednrutsk. 21-35, av Jönköp. radiokl. styr., av pens :nd o. av kyr-kofullm. 30-42, v. ordf. i drätselkamm. 23-35, ordf. i fosterbarnsnd 07-26, ga-tustyr. 22-3(5, sitadsparkstyr. 29-3’5, stadenis vattenledn :komm. o. Jönköp. L. Brandförsäkr :bol. brandstodsnd 08, överförmynd. o. led. av styr. f. S. Vätterns Kraft A-B 17, v. ordf. i Huskvarna KFUM 17-30, led. av styr. f. H. Halls Boktryckeri A-B sed. 24 m. f’l. uppdr. Res. t. Danm., Norge, Finl., Tyskl., Österr. o. Schweiz. RVO, PatrGM, Jönköp. L. Brandförsäkr :-bol. förtj :GM, Sv. Lifförsäkr :bol. förtj:M, Sv.KFUM förtj :M o. hed :dipl.
translated: Johansson, Botvid Karl Gustaf, editor, Huskvarna, born on July 28, 1872 in Huskvarna to parents Alfred J. and Ida Maria Wel-terhoilm. - Local editor in Huskvarna for Jönköp.-Posten from 1899 to 1940, publisher of Huskvarna-Posten since 1911, advertisement manager in H. Hams Boktryckeri AB from 1916 to 1940, editor and Swedish publisher of Huskvarna KFUM monthly magazine since 1920. He was a member of the city YMCA from 1911 to 1942, of committee of inquiry from 1921 to 1935, of Jönköp. radio club board, of pension committee and of church council from 1930 to 1942. He was vice-chairman in drätselkamm from 1923 to 1935, chairman of fosterbarnsnd from 1907 to 1926, ga-tustyr from 1922 to 1936, sitadsparkstyr from 1929 to 1935, water pipeline committee and Jönköp. L. Brandförsäkr: bol. brandstodsnd in 1908, and a guardian and board member of S. Vätterns Kraft AB in 1917. He was vice-chairman of Huskvarna KFUM from 1917 to 1930 and member of the board of H. Halls Boktryckeri AB since 1924. He had several assignments in Denmark, Norway, Finland, Germany, Austria and Switzerland. He was awarded RVO, PatrGM, Jönköp. L. Brandförsäkr: bol. förtj:GM, Sv. Lifförsäkr: bol. förtj:M, Sv.KFUM förtj:M, and honorary diploma. He married in the year 19xx.

structured.name: Botvid Karl Gustaf Johansson
structured.description: Botvid Karl Gustaf Johansson was a well-known editor and journalist from Huskvarna, Sweden.
